text: David Torrence (November 26, 1985 â€“ August 28, 2017) was a Peruvian-American middle-distance runner and indoor American record holder in the 1000 meters (active). He was born in Okinawa, Japan, Torrence was raised in Tarzana, California. Torrence represented Peru at the 2016 Summer Olympics.Boylan, Liam. (September 19, 2013) Throwback Thursday: David Torrence | Runner's World. Runnersworld.com. Retrieved on 2016-08-19. Torrence was found death at his condo in Scottsdale, Arizona on August 28, 2017 at the age of 31. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Peruvian athletes Category:Olympians for Peru Category:American middle-distance runners Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Deaths by drowning
title: David Torrence
